question: Which country hosts the annual "Angouleme International Comics Festival"?
explanation: France hosts the Angouleme International Comics Festival annually in January. The Angouleme International Comics Festival is the second-largest comics festival in Europe after the Lucca Comics & Games in Italy, and the third biggest in the world after Lucca Comics & Games and the Comiket of Japan. It has occurred every year since 1974 in Angouleme, France, in January.
